'''''Mallorn'' 2''' is the second issue of the [[Tolkien Society]]'s journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in 1971.

==Contents==

* '''Editorial'''
** Letters to the Editor
*** By Archie Mercer, Dave Weldrake, Stewart Bailey, A.R. Fallone, Arthur Cruttenden
** Belladonna's Postbag
*** By Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]]), Hal Broome, Dave Weldrake, Philip Howard, Rosie Turner, and James Ead
** Editorial
*** By Steven Thomson
* '''Notes'''
** The Dragon
*** By Dave Weldrake
** Llasar Llaes Something and Family
*** By Archie Mercer
** Hippies or Hobbits?
*** By Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
** On Behalf of the Half-Hippy
*** By A.R. Fallone
* '''Reviews'''
** ''The Last Unicorn'' by [[Peter Beagle]]
*** Reviewed by Alex Holdschmidt
* '''Creative'''
** Silver (poem)
*** Author unknown
** Untitled poem ("Good Boromir, come blow up your horn")
*** By Keith Bridges
** Illustrations
*** By Brian Talbot and A.R. Fallone
